description: BBC Sport tracks the latest news stories from the National League, including managerial announcements, new signings and contract extensions.
title: National League news - April 2025
title_page: National League news - April 2025 - BBC Sport
maintext:
BBC Sport tracks the latest news stories from the National League, including managerial announcements, new signings and contract extensions.
Check out the gossip page for the latest rumours, use our transfers page to track signings made by English Football League clubs or read more National League news from March.
League leaders Barnet have recalled Reece Hall-Johnson and Jermaine Francis from their loan spells at Solihull Moors and Braintree Town respectively.
Right-back Hall-Johnson featured for the Bees earlier in the season and has played seven times for Moors since joining them in February.
Francis has scored eight times in 30 games for The Iron.
Ronan Maher is set to return to Walsall after the expiration of his loan with Tamworth.
The 20-year-old midfielder, who has scored two goals in 12 appearances so far for The Lambs, will play his final game against Maidenhead United on Saturday.
Jack Roles has been recalled by Crawley Town from his loan spell at Gateshead.
The 26-year-old midfielder scored 3 goals in 12 appearances for the Tyneside club.
